Job Title: Senior Buyer

Location: Jersey City, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Purchasing, Supply Chain

Description:
PrideNow is hiring a Buyer for a manufacturer and distributor within the food and beverage industry in Jersey City, NJ.
Job Type: Permanent/Direct HireSalary Range: $85-90k annually. 
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:Purchase merchandise and/or commodities for resaleSolicit quotations from vendors and ensure timely deliveryEngage in price negotiations with vendors and conduct forecasting activitiesGenerate purchase orders, conduct audits and oversee annual inventory processesUtilize analytical problem-solving and effective interpersonal communication skillsPerform multiple tasks simultaneously in a fast-paced environmentMeet deadlines with accurate and detailed resultsJOB QUALIFICATIONS:Bachelor’s Degree from an accredited college or university5-7 years related experience in procurement and supply chain managementMust be familiar with order processing systemsMust be familiar with MS Office Suite including Word and ExcelBilingual in English and Spanish strongly preferred
ABOUT US:PrideNow is Pride Global's light industrial staffing organization, a distinguished division within the Pride Global umbrella.Aligned with the overarching mission of Pride Global, we specialize in delivering top-tier human resources and workforce solutions to the light industrial industry. Leveraging the strength of our global network, PrideNow is dedicated to empowering diversity, ensuring compliance, and driving unparalleled success for businesses. As part of the Pride Global family, we bring forth a commitment to excellence and a comprehensive approach to meeting the unique staffing needs of our clients worldwide. Welcome to PrideNow, where our local expertise seamlessly integrates into the global excellence of Pride Global, shaping a future of dynamic workforce solutions.
BENEFITS DISCLOSURE:Pride Global and its affiliates - including Russell Tobin, Pride Health, and Pride Now - offer eligible employees comprehensive healthcare coverage (medical, dental, and vision plans), supplemental coverage (accident insurance, critical illness insurance and hospital indemnity), a 401(k)-retirement savings, life & disability insurance, an employee assistance program, identity theft protection, legal support, auto and home insurance, pet insurance, and employee discounts with some preferred vendors.
EEO STATEMENT:As a certified minority-owned business, Pride Global and its affiliates - including Russell Tobin, Pride Health, and Pride Now - are committed to creating a diverse environment and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, pregnancy, disability, age, veteran status, or other characteristics.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
